name: Twisted Pair
description:
Sokoban style game with two movable players

There are 10 levels. The goal of each level is to cover all targets with all crates. You can push one crate at a time - crates cannot push other crates. There are two movable characters - so keep an eye on both at all times!

Please feel free to leave a comment! This is a part of a personal challenge to make a simple puzzle game every day for a week, with at least 10 levels. I'm using puzzlescript for each game. This is game six.
